meanings.definition: Programs and other operating information used by a computer.
meanings.sent1: I downloaded new softwares for my computer yesterday.
meanings.sent2: My job involves installing and updating various softwares on computers.
meanings.sent3: The softwares on my laptop decided to have a party and crashed the system.
meanings.sent4: Her brain is like a collection of softwares, each program running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: Softwares are like magic spells that make the computer do amazing things.

meanings.definition: The entire set of programs, procedures, and related documentation associated with a system and especially a computer system.
meanings.sent1: Our company invested in new softwares to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent2: Softwares play a crucial role in the functioning of modern computers.
meanings.sent3: The softwares in the office computer seem to have a secret language of their own.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, the softwares of creativity and innovation are always running.
meanings.sent5: The softwares of knowledge and wisdom are the keys to unlocking success in life.
